Hi Jeff â€“ you could store the page data in a variable using `content_by_id` and use the URL field to query that content via Id.

Something like this should do the trick:

`{% set page_data = content_by_id(module.link.content_id) %}`

`{{ page_data.name }}`

Hope this helps!
